评论详情: the arms are so tight and make your arms (if you have large arms) look like cut off sausages

I am 5’5, 175 pounds and usually wear in between a medium and large. Based on reading some of the reviews for this dress, I ordered an XL to be sure it would fit. It is SO small and has 0 stretch. To me, it fit like a S-M. The middle seem (that I am highlighting in one of the photos) is so tight… on a flowy dress I’d expect that seem to have tons of room to flow, but it had about an inch of room off of my body. It was so awkward to wear. I told my husband I felt like a sausage in a sausage casing with it on… I never expected to feel that way in a flowy dress. The model makes this dress look fantastic, but I’d say you’re better off trying something else.
Beautiful and comfortable fit dress that I am very happy with my purchase.

评论概述: No no no Clown dress-chiffon uncomfortable

Product ran small for me. Had to return
Gave me quadra boob didn't fit well 32ddd

I love the color of this dress. I ordered the blue one and the flowers are very pretty. It’s light weight and fully lined. Fabric quality is great.  It will wrinkle if crumpled for long periods of time.  I love the way it flows.  A little long if you’re working at a desk all day. I found I kept rolling over it if I didn’t wrap it inwards while backing and rolling forwards. Would order in a different color.

评论概述: Not a great for petite women
评论详情: This dress looks so great on the women in the photos (professional and review photos) but even the smallest size was baggy looking and did not look very flattering on my small frame (but somehow looks great in the ad pictures) - the fabric is what you would expect for the price, and it is flowy. I would say this is a good casual dress if you’re in a pinch but personally it looks cheap and definitely does not fit all body types as pictured.
Product ran small and material was a bit cheap
Exactly like the pictures, comfortable and true to size

I have gotten so many compliments on this! I’m 5’6”, 125# and got the small in apricot. It hits just above my ankle. Elastic sleeves and elastic empire waist. It’s lined to the knee. Usually it bothers me when a dress is only partially lined but I believe the lack of lining near the bottom adds to the flowiness. Is that a word? Don’t care. Perfect flowy dress for early fall. The print will work in the spring too!

评论概述: Very pretty but the background color is peachy not pink.
评论详情: I bought this dress hoping the background color was fully pink & I could wear it to an event with a pink & white outfits theme.  But the overall impression is very pretty and very orange.
Great quality , I am going to buy another one in another color

Purchased the black print with the fall flower flowers. I’m 5’2” about 130 and wanted the oversized boho look so I ordered a medium. Drapes off the body so beautifully! Will look great for the family fall photo shoot.

评论概述: The beautiful color of the dresses and slim  looks
评论详情: The Bust is a little too low for my taste.

I’m 4’11” with a 36D bust and this fit well. I was 6 months postpartum and this dress hid my waistline. I felt confident when wearing it and it was a great mix of spring colors. It’s lightweight fabric, flowy but not see through.

Makes me look frumpy. There’s a stich / band all way around hips which is not in the online pic. Material is def not worth more than $20 either. Color is different than what is pictured. So uncomfortable.

This dress fits well, as expected, and is very flattering. Even with short sleeves, the dress was perfect for fall family photos.  The colors are lovely and it was easy to build coordinating outfits for my family in neutrals, greens and even deep red.
Pretty fits well.
I’ve gotten so many compliments . Love this dress
I’m normally a large. I got an XL and it was way too tight in the arms and stomach. This fabric was like tissue paper. I’m returning.

One of my favorite dresses, so much so that I purchased a second in a different color! Fit is lightweight and flowy. Non or low wrinkle. I love the cut. The print and colors are delicately bold. Comfortable. Beautiful. Would buy again and highly recommend!!

评论概述: Has a random drop waist seam across the hips
评论详情: In all the pics and videos, even the user pics from what I could tell, this looks like an empire waist cut. When I put it on, it had an empire seam below the bust but then an additional drop waist seam across the hips, breaking up the silhouette of the dress and making it look so weird. It's like they ran out of fabric and just stitched to skirt to it in a random place.

I love everything about this dress. It’s really flattering on and sits so nicely! The lining & outer fabric is not super stretchy, but the dress is true to size! Super light weight and airy, perfect for an outdoor fall event! 😊
This dress is gorgeous and figure flattering. I received a lot of compliments and have since ordered in another color. Received timely with no issues. Will buy from this seller again.

Style and fit..check! Color..2 thumbs down. I ordered the navy blue which looks like it has pops of bright pink. The dress I received is much more muted, looks almost black and the flowers are like a light dusty pink. Wasn’t what I was expecting. Also my tall ladies..this hits right above the ankle.
I returned my dress because it wasn't the same colors as the photo and the dress was even made differently too. The material is also like Shein fabric, not worth $50.
Great colors and this beautiful maxi dress!! Perfect length and soft material.
The color was really pretty but the dressed fit like a sack. It does not flatter the body, so I had to return the dress.
Great product! Would recommend!
Love the color and style! The cut fits perfectly. The fabric is flowy.

Love the color, love the fabric, prefer the spaghetti strap version of this dress. Didn’t love the sleeves or the elastic around the arms. Just not comfortable and felt like it made my shoulders look square.

The style of this dress was very flattering.  I received many compliments.  The fit was great; loved the v-neck; fun colors; short sleeves were perfect; and most of all - comfortable.  I liked that it was lined as well.  Highly recommend.  True to size but if you are between sizes, then size down.
Nice material/ beautiful vibrant colors/ I usually wear a large or extra large and I ordered a large (the material does not have any stretch). It was snug around my waist and my arms.
Not up to standard
This is an elegant outfit with an elegant look. It is very stylish and looks amazing. The color is so beautiful and the fit is perfect to size. I love it as it is one of my best online purchase.
Fit was much different than what it looks. Material is slight itchy

Run small through the shoulders and chest. Beautiful dress, though, beautiful fabric and colors.
It was cute, but the inner lining was smaller than the dress itself and had no stretch to it.  I got it on but could barely get it off.
I ordered this dress, but returned it. I love the material and fabric, but it fit a little snug up top.  No other issues with it. I ordered true to size, wish it would have worked for me.
True to size. It's a little low cut for me but I use a camie under the dress. Very nice. Recommend
Fits great.
Dress is beautiful! I have this same dress in blue but it has long sleeve. I absolutely love it. It’s flowy and fits absolutely perfectly. I’ve 5’4 and 130lbs and got a small.
Cute dress! Fits my apple shaped body (which is hard to find things for!)
Pretty dress. I ordered XL. The arms and bust area area tight.

评论概述: Don’t plan to wear it without ironing
评论详情: A few things 1. This came rolled up in a very small bag, so it was covered in wrinkles from top to bottom 2. It absolutely reeks like half a bottle of Downey fabric softener was used on it. You could not wear it somewhere without everyone wondering who smelled that way. 3. It is not flattering at all. I am 5’5” 150 pounds. I looked like I was wearing a colorful sack.

I purchased this to attend a summer wedding. I actually bought the muted pink dress with red flowers in an XL and the blue one in a Large as well, just to see which one fit better. No photo (because I'm not happy with my figure), but I can say that the dress runs true to size. The Large fit fine:  I weigh 150 and am 5'3" and wear a 36DD. I hope that helps you figure out the sizing. I usually never wear muted colors, as I'm olive toned, but this dress only comes in slightly muted tones. My husband said that the blue looked nice on me and didn't wash me out color-wise. The muted pink floral did wash me out more, and that's the one that I bought in an XL and returned.
There’s a weird seam right around the hips that cuts in and gives you a weird shape. I returned this
Loved this print but not a flattering dress. Could have just been on my body but was not a fan. Seemed an outdated style of dress
The dress fits true to size and is extremely flattering.  Excellent Quality.
I love the fit and the retro fabric pattern on the dress.  It's long but that's what I wanted.  The fit is flattering and the dress is very comfortable.

I bought this dress last minute, to wear at our son’s graduation. It was a very hot and sweaty event and the dress felt very comfortable and fit beautifully. It held up well in the heat. I ordered a medium based on the size chart, and it’s true to size for me. I’m 5’5 and this dress is fine even when I don’t wear heels. I get compliments every time I wear it. Only caveat: might need static spray after ironing.
I love the dress
I love the color, the fabric, and the style, however the dress round two sizes smaller than what it said.
Was so excited to wear this for a wedding, hung it up right out of the package and went to take it out and it’s ripped. Return window is closed so now I’m stuck with a ripped dress.
For petite frame it’s always hit or miss on maxi dresses, unfortunately this was way too long. It was a beautiful print and very nice

评论概述: The hem length was way longer in the front.
评论详情: I loved this dress! But I tried to wear it and the front of the dress dragged the floor while the back was the perfect length. I decided to compare the front length to the back length and at its longest, the front was 4 inches longer than the back. I’m so disappointed. I loved the way it fit. I would’ve liked to have exchanged  it with another one (to give it another try) but it didn’t give me that option. It only allowed me to return it. Then I have to buy it again as a separate transaction and the price is now higher than what I paid for it a few days ago. I love the way it fit but because the hem was so off, I’m only giving it three stars.

I wore it for my casual dessert wedding with some cute Teva olive green hiking boots and got so many compliments. Comfortable, pretty, and traveled well in a suitcase. What more could you ask for. Nice fabric and it flows well.
I was so excited to get this dress!  It's super cute on.  I have a fuller figure and it fits perfectly!
Product overall is poor quality. First, sizing is completely off. The material is very thin for the price. Might as well go to shein🤣. Would not waste money on this item.
Dress is quite cute, and well-made for the price.  It also has held up nicely to washing.  I wear a 6, got the medium, and it fits perfectly. I like that it's partially lined as well.

评论概述: SMALL IS TOO BIG FOR ME

The dress was too big all the way around, too low cut, and the hem of the dress touched the floor. I am really bummed because it's a really nice dress! Had it fit ok I would have just gotten it hemmed. Please make this dress in XS!!!
I really love this dress. It’s flattering on all sizes. Not sheer and very comfortable

This dress was purchased for our son's Military graduation. I am 5'3" tall and wear a sz 12-14. This dress was stunning. It swept the floor with my high heals, and flowed beautifully in the breeze. It was not  sheer, the slip lining comes just to the knee. I received several comments on the dress that day.
I’m in love with this dress

I get compliments every single time I wear it.  I am also going to wear the peach one again for another wedding I have coming up next month.  This is TTS as well.  I wear a large normally and this large fits perfectly.

Love this dress. The fit and print is so great and length is perfect.  I am 5 feet 10 in. Ordered two more different prints.
This dress is beautiful. If I had the time I would’ve returned my usuals size for a size up…I’m a little on the bustier side so my chest was a little snug

评论概述: Great dress for casual or dressy occasions
评论详情: I ordered this dress to wear to a graduation. It would have been perfect but I just didn't care for the feel of the fabric. The dress is beautiful and it is lined (partially) to knee length. The bottom half of the skirt is not lined, but that wasn't really an issue. The elastic waist and sleeves were comfortable and the neckline was not too revealing. The material was just not as soft as I like. It's a texture thing for me and I didn't like the feel of it on my skin. I chose to return it. I gave it 4 stars because of the feel of the fabric.
This dress is really soft and comfortable. It has an underskirt so it’s not see through and the empire waist is very flattering. I’m 5’3”, 138 lbs and the medium fits perfectly.
